column1: MRI size (256, 256, 1) in weighting T2, showing the head of a man of 37 years old, of coronal section n°78 initiated from the back of the skull. The observed details include: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 1926.1230 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4101.4160 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 210.9375 mm³, the left caudate nucleus of volume 230.7129 mm³, the left putamen of volume 197.7539 mm³, the left nucleus accumbens of volume 55.3711 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 2071.1426 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 4247.7539 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 163.4766 mm³, the right caudate nucleus of volume 249.1699 mm³, the right putamen of volume 232.0312 mm³ and the right nucleus accumbens of volume 30.3223 mm³.
